SELECT sp.id , sp.title , sp.created_at , sp.updated_at , sp.view , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sightingPostLiked WHERE post_id = sp.id) AS like_count , CASE WHEN sp.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN u.user_name WHEN sp.head_id IS NOT NULL THEN sh.company_name END AS writer_name , sp.user_id , sp.head_id FROM sightingPost AS sp LEFT JOIN sightingPostLiked AS spl ON (sp.id = spl.post_id) LEFT JOIN user AS u ON (sp.user_id = u.user_id) LEFT JOIN shelter_head AS sh ON (sp.head_id = sh.head_id)
sp.is_blinded = FALSE AND sp.is_deleted = FALSE
AND (u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{writer}, '%') OR sh.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{writer}, '%'))
AND sp.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND sp.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
AND sp.animal_type = #{animalType}
AND sp.breed LIKE CONCAT('%', #{breed}, '%')
AND sp.color LIKE CONCAT('%', #{color}, '%')
AND sp.sigungu_id = #{sigunguCode}
ORDER BY sp.id DESC
ORDER BY sp.id ASC, sp.id DESC
ORDER BY sp.view DESC, sp.id DESC
ORDER BY sp.view ASC, sp.id DESC
ORDER BY like_count DESC, sp.id DESC
ORDER BY like_count ASC, sp.id DESC
ORDER BY sp.id DESC

SELECT sp.id , sp.title , sp.content , sp.sighted_at , sp.sighted_place , sp.animal_type , sp.breed , sp.created_at , sp.updated_at , sp.view , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sightingPostLiked WHERE post_id = sp.id) AS like_count , sido.sido_name , sigungu.sigungu_name , CASE WHEN sp.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN u.user_name WHEN sp.head_id IS NOT NULL THEN sh.company_name END AS writer_name , CASE WHEN sp.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN spr.name WHEN sp.head_id IS NOT NULL THEN NULL END AS writer_rating , sp.user_id , sp.head_id , spf.file_rename , spf.file_path , spc.id AS comment_id , spc.content AS comment_content , spc.created_at as comment_created_at , spc.updated_at as comment_updated_at , CASE WHEN spc.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN cu.user_name WHEN spc.head_id IS NOT NULL THEN csh.company_name END AS comment_writer_name , CASE WHEN spc.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN spcr.name WHEN spc.head_id IS NOT NULL THEN NULL END AS comment_writer_rating , spc.user_id AS comment_user_id , spc.head_id AS comment_head_id FROM sightingPost AS sp LEFT JOIN user AS u ON (sp.user_id = u.user_id) LEFT JOIN shelter_head AS sh ON (sp.head_id = sh.head_id) LEFT JOIN sigungu ON (sp.sigungu_id = sigungu.sigungu_id) LEFT JOIN sido ON (sigungu.sido_id = sido.sido_id) LEFT JOIN sightingPostFiles AS spf ON (sp.id = spf.post_id) LEFT JOIN sightingPostComment AS spc ON (sp.id = spc.post_id AND spc.is_blinded = FALSE AND spc.is_deleted = FALSE) LEFT JOIN user AS cu ON (spc.user_id = cu.user_id) LEFT JOIN shelter_head AS csh ON (spc.head_id = csh.head_id) LEFT JOIN rating AS spr ON (u.rating_id = spr.id) LEFT JOIN rating AS spcr ON (cu.rating_id = spcr.id) WHERE sp.is_blinded = FALSE AND sp.is_deleted = FALSE AND sp.id = #{postId}

SELECT spr.id , spr.category , spr.etc_detail , spr.created_at , spr.status , spr.post_id , spr.user_id , spr.head_id , CASE WHEN spr.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN u.user_name WHEN spr.head_id IS NOT NULL THEN sh.company_name END AS writer_name FROM sightingPostReport AS spr LEFT JOIN user AS u ON (spr.user_id = u.user_id) LEFT JOIN shelter_head AS sh ON (spr.head_id = sh.head_id) WHERE spr.post_id = #{postId}

SELECT sprc.id , sprc.category , sprc.etc_detail , sprc.created_at , sprc.status , sprc.comment_id , sprc.user_id , sprc.head_id , CASE WHEN sprc.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN u.user_name WHEN sprc.head_id IS NOT NULL THEN sh.company_name END AS writer_name FROM sightingPostCommentReport AS sprc LEFT JOIN user AS u ON (sprc.user_id = u.user_id) LEFT JOIN shelter_head AS sh ON (sprc.head_id = sh.head_id) WHERE sprc.comment_id = #{commentId}
